meanings.definition: A person who causes harm or suffering to others.
meanings.sent1: The inflicter of pain was finally brought to justice.
meanings.sent2: The inflicter of harm was known throughout the village.
meanings.sent3: The inflicter of mischief always had a mischievous grin.
meanings.sent4: The inflicter of sorrow left a trail of tears behind.
meanings.sent5: The inflicter of suffering was feared by all.

meanings.definition: To cause pain or suffering on someone or something.
meanings.sent1: He would inflicter pain on his enemies without mercy.
meanings.sent2: The storm inflicter damage on the fragile crops.
meanings.sent3: The prankster inflicter a harmless scare on his friends.
meanings.sent4: The harsh words inflicter wounds that took time to heal.
meanings.sent5: The virus inflicter illness on the entire population.
